message: The sting was part of Operation Cross Country, the eleventh iteration of the nationwide FBI initiative that ran from Oct. 12-15. According to the FBI, 84 exploited children were rescued and 120 traffickers were arrested. “Anyone can be vulnerable to this situation given the right opportunity,” Broadus said. He said victims come from low-income and wealthy communities, and span all races and ethnicities.

data.description: “Anyone can be vulnerable to this situation given the right opportunity,” FBI Special Agent Brooks Broadus told Eyewitness News.
data.title: FBI cracking down on human trafficking in Rhode Island communities
